title: An open area of 3 sq
clause_text: An open area of 3 sq. m would be required for installation of a solar energy collector which supplies about 100 liters of water per day. At least 60 per cent of the roof area may be utilised for installation of the system.
section: Special Provisions; for installation of Solar Water Heating (SWH) Systems.
